title: Their plane went down - how this WW2 Canada crew survived
description: Eighty years after their plane crashed, the story of a Halifax bomber crew is finally being told.

description: Follow the King's Coronation order of service, line by line.

title: Moment helicopter pulls driver from Kenya flood waters
description: Flash flooding surrounded a lorry driver who was crossing the Gulana-Kulalu causeway in Kenya.

title: Donald Trump denies rape accusation by E Jean Carroll
description: The former president says that, although politically incorrect, his accuser is "not his type".

title: Week in pictures: 29 April - 5 May 2023
description: A selection of striking images from around the world, taken in the past seven days.

title: Miami Grand Prix: World champion Max Verstappen sets rapid pace in second practice
description: Max Verstappen sets imposing pace in Friday practice at the Miami Grand Prix as he heads the Ferraris of Carlos Sainz and Charles Leclerc.

title: Local elections 2023: Opponents gain from shrivelling Tory popularity

title: Newspaper headlines: The King's 'day of destiny' finally arrives
description: The Coronation dominates the papers on Saturday - with the majority of tabloids focusing on the royal event.

title: Catalans end losing run by beating struggling Saints

title: UK counts down to King's historic coronation
description: People across the UK and beyond are preparing to celebrate the coronation of King Charles III.

title: Arsenal Women 1-0 Leicester City Women: Frida Maanum's superb strike seals Gunners win
description: Arsenal can "100%" win the Women's Super League title after victory against Leicester moved them within six points of leaders Manchester United, says Gunners defender Jen Beattie.

title: Eurovision 2023: Ukraine's champions Kalush Orchestra get Liverpool party started
description: Reigning champions Kalush Orchestra kick off the official build-up to the song contest in Liverpool.

description: The monarch is seen laughing and shaking hands with crowds on the Mall a day before his Coronation.

title: Derbyshire election count abandoned after candidate's death
description: Conservative colleagues have paid tribute to Gillian Lemmon who died on Friday.

title: Diamond League: Sha'Carri Richardson sets new 100m meeting record in Doha

title: London Tube passengers smash windows to escape smoke-filled carriage

title: Boy, 16, fatally stabbed in Waltham Forest, London

title: Miami Grand Prix: George Russell leads Mercedes one-two in opening practice

title: Diamond League: Dina Asher-Smith third as USA's Sha'Carri Richardson wins 100m, beating Tori Bowie Doha record
description: Dina Asher-Smith comes third as USA's Sha'Carri Richardson wins the women's 100m final in 10.76 seconds, beating the late Tori Bowie's Doha Diamond League meeting record.

title: CBI hires ethics consultancy to overhaul culture
description: The business lobby group appoints advisors to try to salvage its reputation as police investigate rape claims.

title: White House: Big Tech bosses told to protect public from AI risks
